A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible film\, it does not honor the saga that is Star Wars.. This film lacks true emotion and even though it is 2 1/2 hours long it appears rushed and cheap. This film seems to have a forced agenda of adding characters whether it makes sense or not. It really is a mess of a film... It's almost a parody of Star Wars. Don't even get me started on the random insert of this Rose character who gets a ton of screen time even though she is not important in the slightest to the story. Plus it feels like she is in another movie entirely her tone and demeanor is so wrong its heartbreaking that this film is connected to Star Wars in anyway.
